Player History
Drafted in 13th round, 156th overall pick, by Washington in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/9/2019, off Simon Mateo (HOU)...
Earned first career win on 5/11/2019...
Injured on 7/15/2019 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 10 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Washington on 2/4/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $1,350,000 per year...
Hit first career homerun on 6/16/2020, off Jacob Raymond (HOU)...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
